```{r}
#| label: reading
#| echo: false
library(tidyverse)
age_gaps <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2023/2023-02-14/age_gaps.csv')
```
```{r}
ggplot(sample_n(age_gaps, 100)) + 
  geom_linerange(
    aes(
      y = reorder(movie_name, -actor_2_age), 
      xmin = actor_1_age, 
      xmax = actor_2_age
    )
  ) + 
  labs(x = "", y = "")
```

```{r}

age_gaps |> glimpse()
```

```{r}
#| label: data-processing
df_plot <- age_gaps |> 
  sample_n(20) |> 
  select(movie_name, actor_1_age, actor_2_age, age_difference) |> 
  pivot_longer(
    -c(movie_name, age_difference), 
    names_to = "actor", 
    values_to = "age"
  ) 

glimpse(df_plot)
```
```{r}
#| label: plot
ggplot(df_plot) + 
  geom_point(aes(
    x = reorder(movie_name, age_difference), 
    y = age, 
    col = actor)
  ) + 
  coord_flip() + 
  labs(x = "", y = "")
```
